actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide assistance for the construction, acquisition, and renovation of State and local prison facilities.
short_title: Corrections Construction and Program Development Act

summary.text: Corrections Construction and Program Development Act - Directs the Secretary of Commerce to make grants to States and local governments to cover up to 75 percent of the cost of projects to: (1) acquire, construct, or improve correctional facilities; or (2) improve programs and practices in correctional facilities.

titles.title: Corrections Construction and Program Development Act
A bill to provide assistance for the construction, acquisition, and renovation of State and local prison facilities.
